üå± I am a **computer engineer** specializing in **software development**.

üë®‚Äçüíª Building modern web experiences with **Astro** and **React**.

üìö Currently studying **Laravel** architecture and **Node.js** patterns to improve server-side performance.

‚ö° I am a big fan of **PHP**, even though the internet hates it... and Comic Sans, too (üò¨).

ü§ù I am **eager to collaborate** with the community on [Palestine Support Badges](https://github.com/emanuelghdev/palestine-support-badges), a customisable badge builder designed to show support for Palestine.
